concept.title: What's new in REST API Version 17.0
concept.shortdesc: 7.5.0 introduces version 17.0 of the API endpoints.

section.title: New endpoints
section.p: RESTful API 17.0 introduces new categories of API endpoints and updates to existing endpoints in the following categories:

section.title: Deprecated endpoints
section.p: All version 14.x API endpoints are marked as deprecated in 7.5.0.

Although deprecated endpoints continue to function, they will be removed in a future release. You must update your integration to use the most recent version of the RESTful API. Responses to deprecated endpoint requests include a Deprecated response header.
